text: â€œE iwe Mtumiki! Akakudzera akazi okhulupirira kudzakulonjeza kuti samphatikiza Allah ndi chilichonse ndi kuti saziba, sazichita chiwerewere, sazipha ana awo ndi kuti sazinena bodza lamkunkhuniza, lomwe akulipeka pakati pa manja awo ndi miyendo yawo (pompachika mwana kwa wina amene sali tate wake), ndi kutinso sadzakunyoza pa chinthu chabwino (chimene ukuwaitanira), landira lonjezo lawolo, ndipo apemphere chikhululuko kwa Allah. Ndithu Allah Ngokhululuka kwambiri, Ngwachisoni
